channel.title: [RS]6th Age - Overall video intro
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=JEImWxhg0Bg
Thoughts on the change of story lines? I think it would it be pretty awesome to actually have story lines for more than one god and you can choose which one to align too.
My only real concern is how that will affect the actual quality of the story line.
